page.title: 15Our Fun Day.
page.content: June the 29th was warm and windy,but at least it did not rain.We were glad because that afternoon a day to remember. It was Grendon Underwood School's Fun Day and we had a lot of things for people to do including: Tug o' War,Skittles,Raffle, Welly Wanging,Beat The Goalie,Five a side Football,The Stocks,Plate Smashing plus lots more. The most popular show was the Five a side Football match between the Grendon Rangers and Marsh Gibbon,which Marsh Gibbon won. It was a very enjoyable afternoon and a lot of money was raised. At the end of the day when all the people went home,they all looked very happy.
